messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: ASS BLAST SUIT SENSORS TO MAX

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Just chill the fuck out, everybody. The incompetent captain is gone now, so stop fucking around with eachother and do your jobs.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: What part of  emergency is so hard for you all to understand. Do It again and we're hitting you all with artillery

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Wow you're a special kind of stupid, Whatever. Have fun in hell

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We told you all we would bluespace you if this continued, so we did. Let that be a warning. You do it one more time we repeat the punishment

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to your station, and or captain, being unable to use the emergency alert properly, the bridge has now been locked down. We will be monitoring the station for any REAL emergencies. Centcomm out.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.
